name: AccordClubThailand - MyStyle
description: Provides greater performance by removing ads, huge signature pictures, and unnecessary animated pictures.
additional_info:
Initial release
 - remove ads
 - hide signature picture
 - increase overall font size

Update 24 June 2012
 - revise to support Chrome web browser
 - change default font to Tahoma family
 - hide god-damned huge avatar picture
 - hide social network icons frame at the top of page
